title: The Silent Starlet
synopsis: A rising movie star vanishes from her movie set without a trace. The only clue is a cryptic note left in her dressing room. Did she run away or was she taken?
fullStory: Lila Monroe, Hollywood's newest sensation, disappeared midway through filming her breakout role. She was last seen entering her dressing room during a lunch break. The crew found the room empty, except for a note that read: 'I can't live this lie anymore. The stage is dark.' Her agent is frantic, but the studio director seems unusually calm.

suspects.name: Rex Hunter
suspects.shortInfo: Lila's jealous co-star, who felt overshadowed.

suspects.name: Marcus Thorne
suspects.shortInfo: The controlling studio director with a temper.

suspects.name: Brenda Wallace
suspects.shortInfo: Her secretive agent, who knew Lila wanted to quit acting.

evidence.name: The Cryptic Note
evidence.description: A note written on a napkin: 'I can't live this lie anymore. The stage is dark.'

evidence.name: Rex's Script
evidence.description: Rex Hunter's script has angry scribbles over Lila's lines, with notes like 'She's stealing my spotlight!'

evidence.name: Half-Packed Suitcase
evidence.description: A suitcase hidden in Lila's dressing room closet, half-filled with everyday clothes, not fancy costumes.
